Subject: Issue #7 FINAL FIX: Buffer overflows/underflows - Currently 1 overflow, 5 underflows. Need to achieve 0 overflows, <10 underflows. Root cause: Insufficient buffer sizing algorithm, race conditions in buffer access. Fix: Implement lock-free ring buffer with atomic operations, add predictive buffer sizing based on historical patterns, implement overflow prevention with backpressure mechanism, add comprehensive unit tests. Target: 0 overflows, <5 underflows. File: core/audio/buffer_manager.py
Key Changes: Implemented lock-free ring buffer with atomic operations, added predictive buffer sizing based on historical patterns, implemented overflow prevention with backpressure mechanism, added comprehensive unit tests

Subject: Issue #10 FINAL FIX: Conversation state persistence memory - Currently 3.83GB peak memory vs 2GB target. Root cause: Inefficient state serialization, no compression, large conversation history retention. Fix: Implement state compression (zlib/lz4), add conversation history pruning with importance scoring, use memory-mapped files for large states, implement incremental state updates instead of full saves, add memory profiling and optimization. Target: <2GB peak memory, 99.9% persistence. File: core/conversation/state_manager.py
Key Changes: State compression (zlib), Conversation history pruning, Memory-mapped files (mmap), Incremental state updates (conceptual)
